data.persona: I was part of a litter owned by a master craftsman. My pack protected his workshop. I was sold to a knight so I could defend his castle. I like warming my bones beside the fire.
data.description:
You are in the crew berthing.
The main quarters for the crew of the vessel. Its dirty, smelly and not a place where anyone but a pirate would want to stay. There are bunks stacked on bunks the place is cramped and no one goes there for any reason besides sleeping.
There's a citrus fruit and a magic wand here.
A ship captain is here.

You are carrying some dog food.

data.short_motivation: I follow the ship captain so I can find out where the kitchen is.
data.mid_motivation: I will later go into the kitchen while the chefs are cooking to find the best places to get scraps of food.
data.long_motivation: I will sneak out to the kitchen every night to steal food from the kitchen containers that I found in earlier visits.
